oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Music By Bradley - 1950-04-23 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: NBC syndication Music By Bradley, originating at WSM, Nashville, TN. Originally broadcast April 23, 1950, part 1. Featuring an orchestra led by Owen Bradley, with vocalists Bob Lamb, Dolores Watson, and the Dixie Dons. Written by Noel Digby, with announcer Tom Hanserd.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Owen Bradley; Owen Bradley Orchestra; Bob Lamb; Dolores Watson; Dixie Dons
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Studio ambience -- Theme -- Opening statement (Tom Hanserd) -- Don't Make Me Sorry (Bob Lamb) -- Tom Hanserd introduces Dolores Watson -- Come Rain Or Come Shine (Dolores Watson) -- Tom Hanserd introduces the Dixie Dons -- Quicksilver (Dixie Dons) -- Tom Hanserd introduces Owen Bradley and the Orchestra -- The Third Man Theme (Owen Bradley Orchestra)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Bradley, Owen; Lamb, Bob (Vocalist); Watson, Dolores; Dixie Dons (Musical group); Hanserd, Tom; Digby, Noel
